text: Kuma ba su rarraba ba face bayan da ilmi ya je musu, domin zalunci a tsakaninsu kuma ba domin wata kalma* ta gabata ba daga Ubangijinka, zuwa ga wani ajali ambatacce, da an yi hukunci a tsakaninsu. Kuma lalle ne waɗanda aka gadar wa Littafi daga bayansu, haƙiƙa, suna cikin shakka a gare shi, mai sanya kokanto
